title: Jailed HK tycoon Jimmy Lai sentenced to 14 months for Oct. 1 illegal assembly
content:
1. Jailed HK tycoon Jimmy Lai sentenced to 14 months for Oct. 1 illegal assembly  Reuters
  2. Jimmy Lai and Other Hong Kong Activists Are Sentenced Over Oct. 1 Protest  The New York Times
  3. Hong Kong tycoon Jimmy Lai jailed again as Tiananmen vigil banned  The Guardian
  4. Hong Kong threatens Lai's bankers with jail if they deal in his accounts  Reuters
  5. Tycoon Jimmy Lai, 7 others handed new jail terms over Hong Kong protests  Japan Today
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 獄中の香港人大物Jimmy Lai氏、10月1日の違法集会で懲役14ヶ月の判決
入狱的香港富豪黎明因10月1日的非法集会而被判刑14个月
入獄的香港富豪黎明因10月1日的非法集會而被判刑14個月
